page.title: 15Games.
page.content: Children play a lot of games in the street of our area: {KERBY}Two people play{kerby}each on opposite sides of a narrow road.The ball is thrown at the kerb;if it bounces off,you get one point;if you catch it you get two points. {HIDE'N'SEEK}One person is 'he'(or'it' or'het').'He counts up to a number then goes to look for the others who have hidden;when someone is caught he becomes 'he'and counts again. { {HELPY}is the same only when you are caught you help to find the others. {CHAINY}in{chainy}you join up with the other who are caught and go looking for the others in a chain. {BODY-POPPING}Sometimes you see people break-dancing and body-popping.They are imitating robot.
